summary: Adds a small, but unique and beautiful home near (not in) Riverwood. Features custom storage, unique decorations, an outdoor "hot tub", flora, garden area, and everything one might need for crafting all in a cozy environment. Makes a great starter home as well.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zOSxLnK.png[/img][/center]
[b]

[color=gold][size=5]Description:[/size][/color][/b][size=4] Lucan Valerius of the Riverwood Trader has recently acquired information on the whereabouts of the key to Haven Springs Cottage... As the story goes, the original owner of this home mysteriously disappeared leaving behind a book with the location of the key needed to enter this home. Lucan stumbled across this book and has decided that he doesn't really fancy himself a new home. So, instead he has placed the book for sale in his shop.


- Adds a small, but comfortable home near (not in) Riverwood. This home would make a great starter home or even a great new home in general for those who prefer homes with a more cozy side. The exterior and interior structure of Haven Springs Cottage is inspired by Breezehome. The interior structure is very similar, but not the same!

[color=#1e84cc]Inside Features Include: [/color] Custom Storage, plenty of containers, unique decorations, mannequin, weapon and shield racks, bookshelves and a book storage case, uniquely designed enchanting and alchemist room, and lots of plants to add a livelier and cozier vibe. Now fully navmeshed for followers.

[color=#1e84cc]Outside Features Include:[/color] Full forge with smelter, tanning rack, sharpening wheel, and storage, garden area with 28 plantable spots and custom decorations, lots of flora, a small "hot tub" area behind the home, plenty of lights, and a bridge across the river from the road to reach the home.

[center][size=5][color=red]Requirements:[/color][/size][/center]
[center]Skyrim Up to date
Hearthfire[/center]

[size=4][color=#1e84cc]How to obtain the key:[/color][/size] Go to the Riverwood Trader and purchase the book. Read the small description explaining the location of the key.

It's that simple.

[center][b][size=5][color=Green]Two Versions[/color][/size]

There are two versions to this house mod. One for those who use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5678513]AceeQ[/url]'s Summer Overhaul, like me. This version features more tree and plant types that are retextured through the summer overhaul mod. The second version is for those who do not use the summer mod.

:)
[/b]

Updates:

09/03/14- Navmeshed the home for both files, added an armor workbench, fixed a floating book. All should be well.

[size=4][b][size=5][color=Green]Credits/Mod Resources Used[/color][/size][/b][/size]

Modders Resource Pack by Oaristys
A bunch of resources by Blary
Modders Resource by Eldiabs[/center]

[/size]
author: FatalxSyn
